title: About Me
description: ISTQB-certified Software Quality Engineer, with experience of working within an agile environment, good understanding of the QA processes, methodologies and software testing lifecycle.
Bachelor's degree in computer science; completed Full Stack .NET Cloud Developer Program at Humber College, expanding full stack programming technologies and skills.
Experienced in functional, manual, automated testing in both web and mobile applications, test case management and defect tracking tools, testing REST API endpoints with Postman.
Passionate and curious about technologies and tools, demonstrated strong learning abilities and pick up new systems / technologies quickly.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Detail-oriented with proven ability to multitask with focus on quality.
Capable of working independently and with cross-functional teams, in a fully remote environment.
Fluent in English, Polish, Ukrainian, Russian, French (beginner).
